title: Can't connect to server after champ select
body: After champ select it wouldn't open up the game client and it would keep showing me the reconnect button. No matter how many times I hit it the reconnect button game wouldn't open. I even got low priority queue for not being able to connect from that ranked game.

replies.body: That might be a weird interaction between your network and ISP trying to send your signal to our servers. Let's double check some of your settings really quickly juuuuust to make sure everything is still configured properly. Check out this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for steps on how you can set up port forwarding and flush your DNS. Test it in a custom/practice game and let me know if that helps at all.

I tried using the tool and followed the guide but the same thing is happening https://gyazo.com/05739fc5c7022426566e115778a38e84
I lost 40lp from the 2 games and got 5 games of low priority queue's. The game that I just tested on was a normal game but if I get punished for that too for following instructions that would make things a lot worse.

Don't enter into matchmade games knowing that you might have issues with your connection. I'd suggest again to test all of this in custom/practice games until you know this is sorted out to make sure you don't keep getting penalties.

What tool did you use? This [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) has a list of steps you need to go through to begin troubleshooting, otherwise, it's rather hard for me to figure out what the main problem is. Test those steps in a custom/practice match and let me know what happens along the way.
